pageProduct.name: Oil Garden Lemon Essential Oil 25ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

This oil is stimulating and enlivening.

Also useful for: Acne, oily skin, warts, corns, cold and flu

light fresh, slightly sweet, citrus aroma

Warnings

STORE BELOW 30C. NOT TO BE TAKEN ORALLY. KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN.

Ingredients

Citrus limon fruit peel 1mL/mL

Directions

Adult: To treat ACNE and OILY SKIN: add 5 drops to 10mL base oil and massage onto affected area. To treat WARTS and CORNS: apply 1 drop directly to affected areas up to 5 times daily. To relieve the symptoms of COLDS and FLU: add 5 drops to 1L steaming water, cover head and inhale the vapour. Application to skin may increase sensitivity to sunlight. Not to be used on children under 2 years of age without medical advice. If symptoms persist consult your healthcare practitioner.
